description.p: A Synapse-like control center for Razer devices on Linux. Configure button remapping, macros, RGB lighting, and DPI settings.

ul.li: Button remapping - Remap mouse buttons and keyboard keys
Macro support - Create and execute macro sequences
Multi-layer bindings - Support for Hypershift-like hold modifiers
Profile management - Multiple profiles with per-application switching
OpenRazer integration - Control RGB lighting, brightness, and DPI
Global hotkeys - Switch profiles with Ctrl+Shift+1-9
System tray - Quick access and notifications
